title: Developer Portfolio
desc: My first ever Developer Portfolio. Developed with basic ReactJS and TailwindCSS.

title: Quick Ping (Chat App)
desc:
A real-time chat application built with the MERN stack. Features include:
• Instant messaging with WebSocket technology
• User authentication (JWT and Google OAuth) 
• Responsive TailwindCSS design
• MongoDB message history
• REDUX for state management

title: One Box (Email Manager)
desc: A full-stack email management system built with the MERN stack, featuring IMAP/SMTP integration for real-time email synchronization and DeepSeek API-powered AI suggested replies. Key functionalities include inbox organization, multi-account support, and smart reply generation to streamline email workflows.
